creator: 五行教育
descriptionHtml:
Do you like China and want to understand Chinese culture better?
Do you want to communicate with your Chinese leader, boss or friends with no barriers?
Do you want to travel to or work in China?
Do you want to speak standard and fluent Chinese?
Here is the most unique Chinese learning way. You can play games while learning, and share study experience with like-mined learners!
CHIease, a learning software designed for Chinese lovers. We own a team of famous teachers, with professional, efficient, interesting and lively courses, to help you learn Chinese in ease without having to get stuck with late-night study.
CHIease Highlights:
1. Vary from Person to Person, Individualized Teaching
With intelligent AI, you can be aware of your Chinese proficiency more accurately. It provides you with more reasonable and scientific learning schedule.
2. Basic Pinyin, Essential Video
Genuine and authentic pronunciation, mother-tongue learning scenes. Interactive teaching, heuristic exercise. Phonetic word is combined with daily conversation, and there are progressive HSK level one recording courses, including 12 categories. Online feedback system about learning and teaching helps you to master the scientific syntax.
3. Scene Teaching, Great Positive Energy
For diverse workplace scenarios, there are dissimilar customized courses, so you can make it right now. Remember it fast, and so focused that you can’t stop!
4. Mutual Learning, Mutual Fun
Fun challenges and games after class. Massive Chinese classic films dubbings, knowing more about Chinese film culture. Fashion, food, news, vogue, poetry, and love, you name it.

The reliability of CHIease is the trust and recognition of students.
“If my friends did not tell me CHIease, I might feel distressed whiling learning Chinese as usual, which must kill time in all day.”
“I wouldn’t know that there are so many people who have already learnt Chinese well, If I did not download CHIease. I can’t help learning because they are so powerful!”
“Haha, I am not alone. I like China and Chinese language! Fight for the goal!”
“I met a younger brother who is learning Chinese like me. I have been dying for some company while learning! LOL!”
The best people, the excellent CHIease. What are you waiting for? If you want to hang your life, studying with profound accumulation! Seize CHIease, seize the day!

creator: 五行教育
descriptionHtml:
Do you like China ?
Do you want to communicate with your Chinese leader, boss or friends with no barriers?
Do you want to travel to or work in China?
Do you want to speak standard and fluent Chinese?
This is the Chinese class with feelings of art and technology, and there is the most unique Chinese learning way as well!
CHIease, a learning software designed for Chinese lovers. We own a team of famous teachers, with professional, efficient, interesting and lively courses, to help you learn Chinese in ease without having to get stuck with late-night study.

CHIease Highlights:
1. Exclusive Content
With intelligent AI, you can be aware of your Chinese proficiency more accurately. It provides you with more reasonable and scientific learning schedule.
2. Novel Getting Started Video
Genuine and authentic pronunciation, mother-tongue learning scenes. Interactive teaching, heuristic exercise. Phonetic word is combined with daily conversation, and there are progressive HSK level courses. Online feedback system, learning and teaching suggestions can enhance the efficiency of study.
3. Spontaneous Scenarios Teaching
For diverse workplace scenarios, there are dissimilar customized courses, so you can make it right now. Remember it fast, and so focused that you can’t stop!
4. Full of Pleasure
Fun challenges and games after class. Massive Chinese classic films dubbings, knowing more about Chinese film culture. Fashion, food, news, vogue, poetry, and love, you name it.

CHIease Course Description
Chinese language has already got on international stage, and become a new favorite in the workplace. If you can mater Chinese, you will get the key to success in workplace.

General Chinese refers to the Chinese used in common working occasions of various industries.
It covers 120 common scenes at workplace, and the courses are arranged by the extent of difficulty.
Each lesson is composed by five factors, including Words, Conversations, Comments and Supplement, Tasks.
Words, the high-frequency words of workplace situation.
Conversations, the situational dialogue in the workplace, simple and understandable, focusing on the cultivation of communicative competence.
Comments, the main syntax project or grammar notes and descriptions.
Supplements, added daily vocabulary of various areas.
Tasks, different types of questions, strengthening spoken sentences and vocabulary memory training.

CHIease basic learning plan.
1. Find the right way to learn quickly
Chinese is not difficult to learn, even if you are a beginner and have never encountered Chinese language, characters and culture before. As long as you have the right learning methods and a good learning plan, you will be able to open the door to Chinese language.
The Basics Chinese Learning Plan covers Chinese pinyin, basic vocabulary, core vocabulary, frequency vocabulary, basic conversations and more.

It covers the basic aspects of communication between foreign students and Chinese people in China or abroad, with a selection of more than 500 words most commonly used in daily life, including personal information, diet, health, hobbies, living environment, shopping, etc. These are the most suitable for beginners, and are combined with daily scenarios to help students understand and apply these vocabularies, to achieve the basic communication and master communication skills, to obtain the most basic and practical ability to work in a Chinese environment.

2.One to one works well
We have professional one to one teacher system to guide you and make your Chinese learning more efficient, as long as you want to learn.
Don't worry, if you have any questions, you can ask the teacher online and they will do the best to help you.
What are you waiting for? Let’s go, learn Chinese with CHIease to enjoy the charming Chinese together!

CHIease User Agreement and Privacy Note：https://www.5ideachinese.com/privacy.html

Twitter：https://twitter.com/5ideaChinese

creator: 五行教育
descriptionHtml:
Why do you learn Chinese?
"Chinese economic growth is at a rapid rate, and you can find a better job if know Chinese."
"The Chinese language is very nice, and the Chinese characters are beautiful."
"I would like to read the Chinese version of Romance of the Three Kingdom."
"When people know that I can speak Chinese, they will think I am fabulous."
Preparing for career development? Like Chinese culture? The demand of tourism or communication?
Whatever your "goals" are, learn Chinese with CHIease!
CHIease is an innovative and efficient Chinese learning software with dynamic courses that help you master Chinese easily and speak fluent Chinese anytime anywhere!
CHIease Highlights:
1. Intelligent AI
With intelligent AI, you can be aware of your Chinese proficiency more accurately. It provides you with more reasonable and scientific learning curriculum.

2. Video Courses
Online teachers, authentic pronunciation, interactive teaching, inspiring practice. Basic Pinyin is integrated with daily conversation, and progressive HSK level 1 courses. Immediate feedback on learning outcome and suggestions will be provided as well.

3. Workplace Chinese Courses
Self-adaptive learning system, designed for different workplace scenarios, which lead learners to required "Knowledge" that will make "Just-in-time Learning, Urgent-in-time Learning, and All-in-time Learning" come true to improve your competitiveness of workplace.

4. Full of Pleasure
Fun challenges and games after class. Massive Chinese classic films dubbings, knowing more about Chinese film culture.
Fashion, food, news, vogue, poetry and love, you name it.

CHIease Course Description
Chinese language has already got on international stage, and become a new favorite in the workplace. If you can mater Chinese, you will get the key to success in workplace.
General Workplace Chinese refers to the Chinese used in common working occasions of various industries.
It covers 120 common scenes at workplace, and the courses are arranged by the extent of difficulty.
Each lesson is composed by five factors, including Words, Conversations, Comments and Supplement, Tasks.
Words, the high-frequency words of workplace situation.
Conversations, the situational dialogue in the workplace, simple and understandable, focusing on the cultivation of communicative competence.
Comments, the main syntax project or grammar notes and descriptions.
Supplements, added daily vocabulary of various areas.
Tasks, different types of questions, strengthening spoken sentences and vocabulary memory training.

CHIease Basic Learning Courses:
The Basics Chinese Learning Plan covers Chinese pinyin, basic vocabulary, core vocabulary, frequency vocabulary, basic conversations and more.
It covers the basic aspects of communication, with a selection of more than 500 words most commonly used in daily life, including personal information, diet, health, hobbies, living environment etc. These are the most suitable for beginners, and are combined with daily scenarios to help students understand and apply the vocabulary, to achieve the basic communication and master communication skills. It is useful!

CHIease Advanced Learning Courses:
Advanced learning, suitable for students with some basic Chinese, includes work system, work schedule, workplace life and other content, like basic communication, shopping, restaurants, banks, hospitals and other scenarios. In addition, there are also classical dialogue and vocabulary from classic Chinese movies, which are closely related to work and life and help learners to understand Chinese culture better!

The reliability of CHIease is the trust and recognition of students.

"It is easier to communicate with Chinese customers after learning Chinese with CHIease, and the project goes well!"

Chinese language proficiency in workplace is the core competency for success in your career, and is a prerequisite for "High-quality Skilled Personnel".
Come and learn Chinese with CHIease to achieve your goals.
descriptionShort: An efficient practical Chinese learning APP, making Chinese learning easier.

title: Learn Chinese - CHIease

container.value: 202A, Building 6, No. 48 Chenjiaci Road, Liwan District, Guangzhou

creator: 五行教育
descriptionHtml:
Why do you learn Chinese?
"Chinese economic growth is at a rapid rate, and you can find a better job if know Chinese."
"The Chinese language sound very nice, and the Chinese characters are beautiful."
"I would like to read the Chinese version of Romance of the Three Kingdom."
"When people know that I can speak Chinese, they will think I am fabulous."
Preparing for career development? Like Chinese culture? The demand for tourism or communication?
Whatever your "goals" are, learn Chinese with CHIease!

CHIease is an innovative and efficient Chinese learning software with dynamic courses that help you master Chinese easily and speak fluent Chinese anytime anywhere!

Oral Chinese courses:
Introductory Chinese for absolute beginners, contains Pinyin, basic vocabulary, core vocabulary, high-frequency vocabulary, and basic conversation, and so on.
It covers the basic aspects of communication and selects more than 500 kinds of vocabulary most commonly used in daily life, covering personal information, diet, health, hobbies, living environment, etc. These are the most useful contents to suit the needs of beginners by combining with daily scenarios to help learners understand how to apply these words to achieve authentic daily communication. Practicality is superb!

Spoken Workplace Chinese language courses:
*The course gives learners maximum freedom to follow their rhythm and learn whenever and wherever they want, without entanglement, let you easily fall in love with the Chinese *The automatic adaptive learning system, combined with your actual workplace needs, makes it easier and faster to find "knowledge points" that can be used immediately after learning, giving you the most practical and high-quality workplace Chinese language learning, helping you to master the workplace.

Live-streaming Courses:
What does a real Live-streaming Chinese class look like? What are the differences in teaching styles for different types of courses?CHIease, with its rich learning content and flexible teaching pattern You can enjoy real-time immersive Chinese learning without leaving home.
Course features.
*The advanced video filming method is used to conduct online classes in a live mode, allowing teachers and students to interact with each other in real-time. making the live-streaming Chinese courses the most effective. We also support course playback!

Fundamental Chinese language video course.
Standard pronunciation, flexible learning time, diverse and close to life course elements, the combination of lecture and practice, comprehensive improvement of daily oral communication skills. Exclusive online consultation, real-time guidance, and attention to students' learning progress.
Workplace Chinese language video course.
Workplace practical video courses help students learn more valuable vocational skills and increase their ability to solve actual problems, with strong practicality.

CHIease Advanced Learning Courses:
Advanced learning, suitable for students with some basic Chinese, includes work system, work schedule, workplace life, and other content, like basic communication, shopping, restaurants, banks, hospitals, and other scenarios. In addition, there are also classical dialogue and vocabulary from classic Chinese movies, which are closely related to work and life and help learners to understand Chinese culture better!

Chinese language proficiency in the workplace is the core competency for success in your career, and is a prerequisite for "High-quality Skilled Personnel".
Come and learn Chinese with CHIease to achieve your goals.
